Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: l'll have peace on those terms. They can keep their Red Castle and their iron chair too. The King in the North!

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Ser Alton's pen is occupied, Your Grace. The prisoners from the Yellow Fork.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Does he need to lie down?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Torrhen.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Get back! I want his head! Any man who stands between a father and his vengeance asks for death.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I will have his head. And if you try and stop me

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: And where is our king now?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: He has gone to the Crag to accept the surrender. Aye, gone to the Crag, but not to negotiate. He brought that foreign bitch with him.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Treason? How can it be treason to kill Lannisters?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: When your son returns, I will demand this murderer's head.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Fathers who love their sons do. I will have his head.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I lost one son fighting by your son's side. I lost another to the Kingslayer, strangled with a chain. You commit treason because your children are prisoners? I would carve out my heart and offer it to the Father, if he would let my sons wake from their graves and step into a prison cell.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I don't want your grief. I want my vengeance. And you stole it from me.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Two hundred Northmen slaughtered like sheep.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Will it? They rot in the ground while their killer runs free.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: We're at war. This march is a distraction.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Are we riding to battle at Riverrun?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Then it's a distraction.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Unless he's been breeding them, he don't have enough to make a difference.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: If it's revenge, I still got faith in it.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I can believe till it snows in Dorne. Don't change the fact that we've got half the men.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: May I speak my mind, Your Grace?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I think you lost this war the day you married her.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Lannister filth! Take him!

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Not murder, Your Grace. Vengeance.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Was strangled by the Kingslayer. They were his kin.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Tell your mother to look at them. She killed them as much as I.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: It's treason to free your enemies. In war, you kill your enemies. Did your father not teach you that, boy?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Aye. Leave me to the king. He wants to give me a scolding before he sets me free. That's how he deals with treason. Our King in the North. Or should I call him the King Who Lost the North?

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: The blood of the First Men flows through my veins as much as yours, boy. I fought the Mad King for your father. I fought Joffrey for you. We are kin- Stark and Karstark.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: I don't want it to save me. I want it to haunt you to the end of your days.

Name: rickard karstark
Sentence: Kill me and be cursed. You are no king of mine.
